description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f2p76","text":"Sample preparation for mass spectrometry analysis involves numerous liquid transfer steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":59,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sg6m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bo8v5","text":"These include ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"843qq","text":"sample lysis, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21v4a","text":"protein extraction, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a7o1","text":"solubilisation, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4p0fm","text":"estimation, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3b9mi","text":"reduction and alkylation, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a49s1","text":"normalisation, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4puop","text":"clean-up, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2b36b","text":"enzymatic digestion, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6odtu","text":"and desalting. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qikc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acfav","text":"Adapting these steps onto an automated workstation can increase efficiency, throughput, and reduce coefficients of variance (%CV) thereby providing reliable reproducible data for statistical comparisons.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":125,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sj48","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68bbm","text":"This protocol is part of a modular collection for the processing of biological samples for proteomics. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ebaj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hnm","text":"The entry point is ultrasonication of biological samples (cells, tissues, laser captured FFPE sections) using a plate based LE220+ system from Covaris, followed by sample processing with a Biomek NxP workstation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eva3l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57gr7","text":"Technical measurement of workflow percentage coefficients of variation (%CVs) using HeLa extract at the entry stage, to measurement of the ion intensities at the data processing stage with data collected by DDA using a QE-HF and processed using Progenesis-QI for proteomics has shown that one third of peptides have %CVs below 20%, and with 80% of peptides having %CVs below 30%. Using Progenesis QI for proteomics indicates that 98% of peptides are found in all 7 replicates processed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":316,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":327,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":375,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3uup2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6nvg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d11ss","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ejmj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2snam","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dsf8s","text":"In addition, the whole procedure (80 samples) may be completed in a day, if shorter digestion times are utilised.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":370,"id":428996,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/jpeg","originalFile":{},"original_name":"percentageCVsNxP.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pc8gbptmp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pc8ebptmp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pc8fbptmp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pc8dbptmp.webp","width":550}}}}
